title: (We Don't Need This) Fascist Groove Thang

lastfm.summary: "(We Don't Need This) Fascist Groove Thang" is an anti-fascist protest song by British synth pop band Heaven 17, released as their debut single in support of their debut album Penthouse and Pavement on March 13, 1981. Despite being banned by the BBC for calling then United States President Ronald Reagan a fascist, the song reached #45 on the UK singles chart. The song has since been covered numerous times, most notably by American dance-punk revival band LCD Soundsystem. Read more on Last.fm.
